content: निष्कारणं {@--1@} Removing, taking away. {@--2@} Killing; <ab>cf.</ab> निकारणं.

--कारण (निष्कारण) {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} causeless, unnecessary. {2} disinterested, free from any motive; निष्कारणो बंधुः. {3} groundless, not proceeding from any cause. (--णं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} without any cause or reason, causelessly, needlessly.
